div.p: The 0.8.2 release includes extensive bug fixes and theme updates in the router and in i2psnark. There are also optimizations to reduce memory usage in i2psnark. The HTTP and SOCKS proxies now support local and remote authorization. As usual, upgrading is recommended.
I2P will be at 27C3 in Berlin the week of the December 27th. Look for the I2P people there and ask for I2P stickers!

Please help grow the network. Say hello to the volunteers on the #i2p-help IRC channel. Get involved, spread the word, and donate! If you find a bug, please enter a report on trac. We are still looking for volunteers to work on new and existing translations. Please volunteer on IRC #i2p.
